name: Bookfernum
description:
Prototype game made in Unity in which you control a book trying to escape from a fantasy library.Gamepad required
Controls

(Xbox gamepad)

Left joystick - Movement

Right joystick - Camera

A - Glide after jump & Interact.

B - Possessing and dispossessing enemies

Gameplay:

https://youtu.be/FvZDXTr3u4A

Credits: Creanavarra students.

Note: This is a final year project from Creanavarra students of 2019.
